title: L'Oreal Paris True Match Naturale Gentle Mineral Concealer, Light/Medium 480, 0.07 Ounce
description: True Match Naturale™ Gentle Mineral Concealer SPF 25 adds coverage to those areas where you need a little more, covering up imperfections and dark circles. Its light and gentle formula is enriched with vitamins and minerals that nurture your skin and make it safe for sensitive and delicate skin around the eyes. Plus SPF 25 protects skin from premature aging caused by harmful UVA/UVB sun rays. True Match Naturale™ Gentle Mineral Concealer blends seamlessly with a professional brush.

title: Mineral Fusion Natural Brands Pressed Foundation, Warm 2, 0.32 Ounce
description: Use Mineral Fusion's pressed base foundations to create a beautiful complexion. Our pressed powders provide light to fill buildable coverage. Our triple-milled minerals offer flawless coverage that instantly evens skin tone and minimizes the appearance of fine lines. Packed with antioxidants and skin soothing botanicals, such as vitamins C and E, sea kelp, white tea, red and pomegrante as well as licorice root and pyncogenal. Free of gluten, parabens, artificial colors, phthalates and talc. Mineral Fusion's full line of mineral cosmetics creates a synergy where beauty and skincare become one, instantly perfecting your complexion while improving the condition of your skin. Our cosmetics are naturally formulated, combining exquisite mineral color with rich botanical actives and nourishing vitamins.  We are dedicated to simplifying your beauty experience, making beauty healthy, and sharing beauty with our community- we call this pursuit mineral on a mission. Tm
